name: script-retryer
description: Retry bash/powershell/python script several times with delay.
author: Lukasz Cymanowski

inputs.name: targetType
inputs.label: Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Target script type: File Path or Inline

inputs.name: filePath
inputs.label: Script Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of the script to execute. Must be a fully qualified path or relative to $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory).

inputs.name: arguments
inputs.label: Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Arguments passed to the shell script. Either ordinal parameters or named parameters.

inputs.name: script
inputs.label: Script
inputs.defaultValue:
# Write your commands here

echo 'Hello world'

inputs.name: delay
inputs.label: Delay in seconds before retry script

inputs.name: directoryFormat
inputs.label: Current direcory format
inputs.helpMarkDown: Some shells requires to call script with Windows path (e.g. powershell on windows agent). Please try that option if you see errors about not founding script in path

inputs.name: scriptExtension
inputs.label: Script extension
inputs.helpMarkDown: Some interpreters requires extension (e.g. powershell requires ps1).

inputs.name: failOnStderr
inputs.label: Fail on Standard Error
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is true, this task will fail if any errors are written to the StandardError stream.

messages.JS_Stderr: Bash wrote one or more lines to the standard error stream.
messages.JS_TranslatePathFailed: Unable to translate the path '%s' to the Linux file system.
messages.JS_InvalidInput: Incorrect value setup for %s field, number required
messages.JS_MissingExecutableBit: Executable bit is not set on target script!
